# Projects \hrulefill

## Academic projects

\footnotesize \textbf{Analysis of the variation in piRNA expression across three \emph{Mus} species}

* \scriptsize - Role:  Bioinformatician, master student (UOC, 2022), PhD student (UAB) | Supervisor: Dr. Tanya Vavouri.
* \scriptsize - Description: *As part of my master's thesis (UOC, 2021-22) and PhD project (UAB, 2022-Present), I am studying  Piwi-interacting RNAs (piRNAs), small RNAs that silence transposons in the germline of most animals, and the variation of piRNA-producing loci across closely related species of mouse.* 

\footnotesize \textbf{Influence of Xrn1 in nucleosome positioning across \emph{Saccharomyces cerevisiae} genome and its effects in transcription}

* \scriptsize - Role: Master student (US, 2018). | Supervisors: Dr. Sebastián Chávez de Diego and Dr. Gabriel Gutiérrez Pozo.
* \scriptsize - Description: *As part of my master's thesis (US, 2018), I participated in a project to study Xrn1, a protein involved in the degradation of mRNA, and its role in the nucleosome localization and transcription of \emph{Saccharomyces cerevisiae}. Analizing MNase-seq data, we found that Xrn1 knockout induce an increase nuclosome occupancy around TSS, likely explaining a decrease in transcription initiation, whereas in the gene body, the nucleosome occupancy decreases as a consequence of the RNA pol II backtracking. Results were validated using MNase-qPCR for two selected genes in Xrn1 conditional mutants.*
* \scriptsize - Related publications: [Begley *et al*., RNA Biology, 2020](https://doi.org/10.1080/15476286.2020.1845504)

\footnotesize \textbf{Butyrate-induced changes in the diversity of the intestinal mucosa-associated microbiota in colorectal cancer patients submitted to a lateral ileostomy}

* \scriptsize - Undergraduate student (UdG, 2017). | Supervisor: Prof. Jesús García-Gil.
* \scriptsize - Description: *As part of my bachelor's thesis (UdG, 2017)*.
